{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TD-VG3631 |revision=V1 |asin=B009PY5JYO |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |type=wireless router,dsl modem,analog phone gateway |fcc_date=12/22/2012 |fcc_id=TE7TDVG3631 |ic_id=8853A-VG3631V1 |pcb_id=2011500110 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=TrendChip |cpu1_model=TC3182;TC3182PEV, LQ216G; |cpu1_cspeed=450 |fla1=8 MiB |fla1_brand=Eon |fla1_model=EN25Q64 |ram1=32 MiB |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9425G6JG-4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT5392L |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=TrendChip |sw_model=TC2205F |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=DSL AFE;TrendChip;TC3086;TC3086, QFR, 54, EPG;1; |flags=ADSL2+ |stock_os=Linux;2.6.22.15; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=A0:F3:C1 |oui_eth=A0:F3:C1 }} {{TagLine|Wireless N300 VoIP ADSL2+ Modem Router}} :[http://www.tp-link.com/us/products/details/?model=TD-VG3631 Product page]
"2011500110 Rev:1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The default SSID pattern is probably '''TP-LINK_XXXXXX'''.
===Specifications=== :Wireless: 802.11b/g/n 2.4GHz N300 (300Mbps) :Antenna: 2x 5dBi detachable antennas :Ports: 2x FXS, 1x FXO, 2x USB 2.0
*https://openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-vg3631 :TC3182PEV-LQ216G (MIPS34K V5.4) @450MHz :[[TrendChip]] TC3182 SoC prom init :CPU revision is: 00019554 :CPU frequency: 448.24 MHz :Flash: 8MB EN25Q64 (SPI) :Memory size: 32MB :TC3262 GMAC Ethernet (A0:F3:C1)
*https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=47839 :ADSL Modem: TC3086 (QFR 54 EPG) :Network Switch: TC2205F :VoIP Chips: :Le89810BSC :Le89116QVC :Le89316QVC
